price: Kwa hakika hao ambao kwa kumwogopa Mola wao Mlezi wananyenyekea,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
footnotes: Hakika wale ambao humkhofu Mwenyezi Mungu na humwogopa, na zimejaa ndani yao khofu ya Mwenyewe Subhanahu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
